New Records: Buddy Hield has made 12 of 16 3-pointers in his first two games, the most in NBA history for a player with a new team.
Key Match Events: Buddy Hield scored 27 points, including 24 in the first half, to help the Warriors coast past the Jazz.
Others: The Jazz opened with a 15-6 lead, but the Warriors took a double-digit lead early in the second quarter.
Utah shot 31.5%. The Jazz are 0-26 in games shooting below 33%.
